body.name: 1080P Security Camera Outdoor Wired/Wireless Starlight Color Night Vision, 2MP Cameras for Home AI Human Detection & Auto Tracking, IP66 2-Way Audio, US Cloud, Compatible with Alexa (1PCS)
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
features: 1080P HD Images and Starlight Colour Night Vision: The security camera supports 2MP HD and digital zoom to ensure you see super clear details in both day and night. The outdoor surveillance camera supports full colour/night vision. Whether under faint starlight or in complete darkness, it ensures that distant objects are clearly monitored, bringing you the best night vision experience.

Ai Body Detection and Motion Tracking Alerts: Motion tracking allows the surveillance camera to accurately detect and automatically track objects over a wide area, and Ai Body Detection reduces false alarms caused by pets, insects, and falling leaves. When enabled, the home security camera will begin to automatically record and track objects in motion and "alert" when needed.

TWO-WAY AUDIO AND ALARM: The Wifi security camera lets you talk to family or visitors from your mobile phone. You can set up an audible alarm to sound a loud siren when a moving object is detected, and the built-in advanced microphone and speaker can scare away unwanted visitors and greet welcome guests.

MULTIPLE USER SHARING THAT WORKS WITH ALEXA: This outdoor security camera supports multiple users watching video at the same time, so you can share your home security camera with family and friends for extra security. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant. Camera and app are easy to install and simple to control.

Cloud storage and IP66 waterproof: Built-in micro SD slot supports micro SD cards up to 32G. (SD card not included). The Home Security Outdoor Camera supports encrypted secure cloud storage to ensure that all pictures and videos are safe and secure and can be viewed on your mobile phone at any time. The camera can operate in temperatures ranging from -13°F to -122°F. It can withstand harsh weather, rain or shine.
body.description: POHAAGNZE 1080P Security Camera Outdoor Wired/Wireless Full Color / Night Vision, 2MP Cameras for Home AI Human Detection & Auto Tracking, IP66 2-Way Audio, US Cloud, Compatible with Alexa

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The dual-band WiFi connectivity, which operates at 2.4 and 5 GHz, guarantees a steady and dependable connection, which enables me to view live video and warnings without any difficulty using the accompanying mobile application. The process of setting up the camera was simple, and the fact that it is compatible with both cloud storage and SD card storage choices provides a degree of flexibility in terms of data storage requirements. The auto-tracking capability of this dome camera is, in my opinion, a vital component of the camera. As it intelligently tracks movement, it is able to capture every detail and provide a full image of the surrounding environment. During the process of monitoring outside areas, this proved to be quite useful since the camera was able to follow any movement that occurred within its range of vision. Another feature that stands out is the camera's exceptional waterproof certification of IP66, which guarantees that it will function faultlessly in a wide range of weather situations. Because of the two-way audio feature, I have a heightened feeling of trust and confidence. My ability to converse with guests or discourage prospective attackers from a distance is made possible by the microphone and speaker that are embedded into the device. Having access to this interactive function provides an additional degree of confidence, particularly while I am away from home. The quality of the audio transmission is remarkable, and the ability to communicate in real time is an extraordinary advantage that contributes significantly to the upkeep of a safe environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Feel Safe
reviews.reviewText: The camera functions in all weather conditions and is waterproof. Its two-way audio feature is one of the main reasons I bought it. I can talk to my guests easily and hopefully scare away those who shouldn't be there. I can see them on my phone, so I can do it without even being in their direct line of sight. With real-time communication, this increases my sense of safety and security as well as that of my house.I can simply monitor live video and receive warnings using a free mobile app with the use of dual-band WiFi access. This camera is straightforward to set up and it includes intelligent movement tracking that can record every detail and completely capture the surroundings. It is reasonably priced and gives me a sense of security to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: Installed it in the garage just for a little extra security. Was able to connect seamlessly even though the wifi signal wasn't ideal there.For its price, this is a win and comes jam-packed with features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. There's still a lot of learning to do of how to use this camera, but I love the idea of directly connecting it to ethernet. It will keep recording unless you lose power completely. Unlike other name brands that I purchased in the past, nothing but headaches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars clear quality pictures
reviews.reviewText: These security cameras have exceeded my expectations. The app works well, and while everything could be improved, the cameras are very clear and simple to use. These cameras have a few features that I adore. The tracking feature is the most important. If a person is detected, it will move and keep that person in frame. The spotlight is up next. It is very visible and alerts people that they are being recorded. It's also convenient because when I walk outside, the light turns on and follows me, providing a well-lit path. Make sure you get them some micro SD cards so they can record. The security camera provides a resolution of 1080P, indicating high-definition video quality.Outdoor Use: The camera is designed for outdoor use, making it suitable for monitoring the exterior of homes or other properties.Wired/Wireless: The camera supports both wired and wireless connectivity options, offering flexibility in installation.Starlight Color Night Vision: This feature suggests that the camera is equipped to capture color images in low-light conditions, providing enhanced night vision.2MP Cameras: The cameras have a 2-megapixel resolution, contributing to the overall image clarity.AI Human Detection & Auto Tracking: The camera is equipped with artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities for human detection and auto tracking, allowing it to focus on and follow detected human subjects.IP66 Rating: The camera has an IP66 rating, indicating resistance to dust and water, making it suitable for outdoor environments.2-Way Audio: The camera features two-way audio, allowing users to listen and speak through the camera using a connected device.US Cloud: The mention of US Cloud indicates that the camera may support cloud storage services located in the United States.Compatible with Alexa: The camera is compatible with Amazon Alexa, suggesting it can be integrated with Alexa-enabled devices for voice control and monitoring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wi-Fi based security camera. Great for indoors or outdoors. Really easy to mount to the wall for security safety. Record and keeps live feed of direction it’s in, and can see at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera option if you are looking for an inexpensive weatherproof option with good features
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good camera for inexpensive quick out-of-the-box setup and use.Pros:Super easy to set up.Multiple different ways to connect.Easy to use app.Easy to check from anywhere.PTZ functions allow for more coverage area.Very good audio.Very good video quality.Cons:None reallyYou need to have a connection to electricityAll in all, this is a great camera option if you are looking for an inexpensive weatherproof option that have easy access to electricity.
